articles.content:
Rennie said the try-scoring machine had a pretty impressive skill set that should translate well into the 15-man game, but theres no plan to throw him into action straight away.

articles.author: Michael Whiting
articles.title: North to Melbourne: Big Ben now a Demon - AFL
articles.description: Melbourne lands North key forward Ben Brown
articles.content:
KEY FORWARD Ben Brown has finally made his way to Melbourne.
